name: Userstyles.org - Hide Deleted Userstyles
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
***** UPDATE - August 3, 2011: IT'S HAS RETURNED!!! ***** BIG THANK YOU TO user 61655 FOR RESURRECTING THIS STYLE!!! Just a simple style that automatically hides all userstyles that have been marked as "deleted" by their author. Enjoy! Also, if you want to change userstyles back to how it use to look, install style 19263 by user 11003.

user.name: DaveyJake
user.about: To find out more about me, your best bet to click on the link below aka my "homepage."

obsoletion_message: The new userstyles layout makes it impossible to hide deleted styles now.
